Please also note that non-payment of the deposit, insufficient available credit, past due outstanding invoice balances & delivery changes made 48 hours from ship date may likely delay the delivery of this order. Kindly coordinate with your partner support representative for the details of the account settlement needed at least 7 days from the delivery date.
